description: You can locate default LAYOUT files by following these steps: Open the Finder window and click the SketchUp folder in the location you saved it (most likely under Applications). Then right-click the LayOut application icon Select Show Package Contents → Contents → Resources → English.lproj , the LAYOUT files will be located in Scrapbooks or Templates folders.

You can create your own LAYOUT files as well: With the LayOut application open, select File → Save As... , and choose where you want it saved and named. You can also go to File → New , then [File → Save As...[/m].
